Field.Name: Field49
Field.Text: Each 630A DIN unit is supplied with 500mm length of 70mm2 tinned copper braid. The braid s crimped at one to a copper lug and is bolted firmly to the earth bar using stainless steel material

Field.Name: Field15
Field.Text: LVB is secured firmly on the floor properly aligned and correctly positioned

Field.Name: Field22
Field.Text: Bus-coupler and transformer incoming links are aligned and can close/open properly

Field.Name: Field51
Field.Text: Substation auxiliary supply cables are terminated onto one of the 60A connectors

Field.Name: Field52
Field.Text: Auxiliary supply wires are not run or tied directly behind the transformer incoming and outgoing link units and are neatly tied and bundled in insulated coil away from any "live" parts

Field.Name: Field26
Field.Text: Door lock and latch are in order

Field.Name: Field28
Field.Text: Door can open and close properly

Field.Name: Field31
Field.Text: Acrylic plastic "DANGER" warning sign is mounted outside LVB

Field.Name: Field57
Field.Text: - Fuse units are labeled as "VOLTMETER FUSES"

Field.Name: Field34
Field.Text: CTs are installed properly and not in contact with live parts

Field.Name: Field58
Field.Text: - For 2,400A LVB, ammeters are affixed with additional label "FOR 1.5MVA TRANSFORMER, MULTIPLY BY TWO"

Field.Name: Field35
Field.Text: Insulated caps covering all bolts & nuts at busbar

Field.Name: Field169
Field.Text: - The respective phases of the busbars are labeled with "L1, L2, L3 and N" and on the left side of the busbars next to the CTs.

Field.Name: Field39
Field.Text: Insulation resistance with 1KV insulation tester is more than 5MΩ

Field.Name: Field156
Field.Text: - transparent insulating cover for transformer incoming and outgoing units

Field.Name: Field43
Field.Text: LVB neutral bar is connected to substation main earth bar with 125mm2 insulated tinned copper bar or 150mm2 Cu cable

Field.Name: Field157
Field.Text: - phase dividing barriers for each outgoing unit

Field.Name: Field163
Field.Text: LVB earth bar is connected to substation main earth bar with 125mm2 insulated tinned copper bar or 150mm2 Cu cable

Field.Name: Field160
Field.Text: - wooden clamps for transformer incoming unit

Field.Name: Field44
Field.Text: LVB earth bar is connected to LVB neutral bar with 125mm2 insulated tinned copper bar

Field.Name: Field161
Field.Text: - metallic clamps for all outgoing 630A units

Field.Name: Field62
Field.Text: White A4 size temporary sticker is pasted on the inner side of the left door

Field.Name: Field46
Field.Text: LVB earth bar is bonded to the frame of the LVB

Field.Name: Field79
Field.Text: NB: This checklist is to be attached with Declaration of Work Completion for claim certification
